original_text: And he said, “The Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders, the chief priests and the teachers of the law, and he must be killed and on the third day be raised to life.”
korean_text: 이르시되 인자가 많은 고난을 받고 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 버린 바 되어 죽임을 당하고 제삼일에 살아나야 하리라 하시고

sentences.original_text: "The Son of Man must suffer many things
sentences.korean_translation: 인자는 많은 고난을 받아야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and be rejected by the elders
the chief priests and the teachers of the law

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 죽임을 당해야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and on the third day be raised to life
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 셋째 날에 살아나야 할 것이다
